About Us

Water Done Right

Cunningham Pure Water LLC brings Wellsys' industry-leading bottleless water coolers and ice machines to Louisiana businesses. Advanced multi-stage filtration. Sleek, modern design. Hassle-free rental programs.

Pure Filtration

5 & 6 stage reverse osmosis removes 99%+ of contaminants for the cleanest water possible.

Eco-Friendly

Eliminate plastic bottle waste. Better for your business and the planet.

Always Fresh

Hot, cold, and ambient water on demand. No jugs to lift, store, or schedule.

Our Products

Wellsys Water Solutions

Industry-leading reverse osmosis water coolers and ice machines. Designed for reliability, built for performance.

Water Coolers

Free-standing and countertop models with advanced multi-stage reverse osmosis filtration.

  • Hot, Cold & Ambient Options
  • 5 & 6 Stage Reverse Osmosis
  • Touchless Dispensing Available
  • Energy Efficient Operation
  • Sleek, Modern Design

Ice Machines

Commercial-grade ice production with built-in reverse osmosis water purification.

  • Up to 389 lbs Ice/Day
  • Chewable Ice Cubes
  • Built-in Reverse Osmosis Filtration
  • Self-Sanitizing Options
  • Antimicrobial Protection

Countertop Models

Compact countertop units perfect for break rooms and smaller spaces.

  • Space-Saving Design
  • Ice, Hot & Cold Water
  • Advanced Filtration
  • Easy Installation
  • Low Maintenance
